links.name: Uniswap
links.description: Uniswap is a decentralized exchange that allows users to trade ERC-20 tokens directly on the Ethereum blockchain.

links.name: SushiSwap
links.description: SushiSwap is a community-driven decentralized exchange that aims to provide liquidity to the broader DeFi ecosystem.

links.name: Curve
links.description: Curve is a decentralized exchange that specializes in stablecoins and low-slippage trading.

links.name: Balancer
links.description: Balancer is a decentralized exchange that allows for custom pools and automated market-making strategies.

links.name: Kyber Network
links.description: Kyber Network is a decentralized liquidity protocol that enables instant swaps and payments between different tokens.

links.name: DODO
links.description: DODO is a decentralized exchange that utilizes a unique Proactive Market Maker (PMM) algorithm for efficient price discovery.

links.name: Oasis
links.description: Oasis is a decentralized exchange that specializes in stablecoins and allows for limit orders and customizable slippage.

links.name: Tokenlon
links.description: Tokenlon is a decentralized exchange that uses an off-chain order book and on-chain settlement to enable fast and low-cost trades.

links.name: MDEX
links.description: MDEX is a decentralized exchange on the Huobi Eco Chain (HECO) that utilizes a hybrid AMM-Order book model for trading.

links.name: QuickSwap
links.description: QuickSwap is a decentralized exchange built on Polygon (formerly Matic) that focuses on fast and cheap trading of ERC-20 tokens.

links.name: DFyn
links.description: DFyn is a decentralized exchange built on Polygon (formerly Matic) that features high-speed trading and low fees.
